titleStmt.title: The second part of Mr. Waller's poems Containing, his alteration of The maids tragedy, and whatever of his is yet unprinted: together with some other poems, speeches, &c. that were printed severally, and never put into the first collection of his poems.
titleStmt.author: Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.
Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687. Maid's tragedy. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Bennet, at the Half-Moon in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With an initial leaf: Licensed, Sept. 26. 1689.
